{{ doc.company }}

{% if doc.service_type !=None %} {{ _("Service Type") }}: {{ doc.service_type }}
{% endif %} {% if doc.restaurant !=None %} {{ _("Restaurant") }}: {{ doc.restaurant }}
{% endif %} {% if doc.restaurant_table !=None %} {{ _("Restaurant Table") }}: {{ doc.restaurant_table }}
{% endif %} {% if doc.driver_full_name !=None %} {{ _("Driver") }}: {{ doc.driver_full_name }}
{% endif %} {% if doc.name !=None %} {{ _("Receipt No") }}: {{ doc.name }}
{% endif %} {{ _("Date") }}: {{ doc.get_formatted("posting_date") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("posting_time") }}
{% if doc.customer !=None %}
{{ _("Customer Name") }}: {{ doc.customer_name }}
{% endif %} {% if doc.contact_mobile !=None %} {{ _("Phone") }}: {{ doc.contact_mobile }}
{% endif %} {% if doc.service_type =="Delivery" %} {% if doc.address_display !=None %} {{ _("Adress") }}: {{ doc.address_display }}
{% endif %} {% endif %}

{% if doc.grand_total > 50000 %} {% set customer_address = doc.address_display.replace("\n", " ").replace("
", " ") %} {{ _("Customer") }}:
{{ doc.customer_name }}
{{ customer_address }} {% endif %}

{%- for item in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%}
{{ _("Item") }} {{ _("Price") }} {{ _("Qty") }} {{ _("Amount") }}
{{ item.item_name }}
{%- if item.gst_hsn_code -%}
{{ _("HSN/SAC") }}: {{ item.gst_hsn_code }} {%- endif -%} {%- if item.serial_no -%}
{{ _("Serial No") }}: {{ item.serial_no }} {%- endif -%} 		{{ item.rate }} {{ item.qty }} {{ item.get_formatted("amount") }}
{%- for row in doc.taxes -%} {%- if (not row.included_in_print_rate or doc.flags.show_inclusive_tax_in_print) and row.tax_amount != 0 -%} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- if doc.discount_amount -%} {%- endif -%} {%- if doc.rounded_total -%} {%- endif -%} {% if doc.paid_amount !=0 %} {%- endif -%} {%- if doc.change_amount -%} {%- endif -%}
{{ row.description }} {{ row.get_formatted("tax_amount", doc) }}
{{ _("Discount") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("discount_amount") }}
{{ _("Grand Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("grand_total") }}
{{ _("Rounded Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("rounded_total") }}
{{ _("Paid Amount") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("paid_amount") }}
{{ _("Change Amount") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("change_amount") }}

{{ doc.terms or "" }}
